# EBRD investment in Romania hit record EUR 955 million in 2025

Friday, January 30, 2026

[Share](http://www.addtoany.com/share_save)

![260130102828EBRD_Logo.jpg](https://actmedia.eu/images/articles/260130102828EBRD_Logo.jpg)

The European Bank for Reconstruction and Development (EBRD) invested EUR 955 million in 37 projects in Romania in 2025, a sharp increase from EUR 707 million for 44 projects in 2024, according to an EBRD press statement released on Thursday.

"This is our largest annual business volume on record in Romania since the EBRD began investing here in 1992 - a truly amazing demonstration for the trust of our clients, the dedication of our team and the strength of Romania's economy," says Victoria Zinchuk, EBRD Director of Romania.

Green financing was again central to the bank's work in the country. In 2025, 81 per cent of EBRD investments in Romania were dedicated to the green economy, significantly above the bank's average across all regions.
